name: cerberus-chatbot
title: Cerberus Chatbot
description: A real-time chatbot developed for the Universidad Nacional de Colombia using Django, Django Channels, and Langchain. The chatbot provides interactive responses to university-related queries through a React-based web interface.

name: BullSolve-A-Mathematical-Problem-Solving-Model
title: BullSolve: Mathematical Problem Solver
description: An AI-powered system that combines neural networks and LLaMA-3.1-8B to solve and explain mathematical problems with 85% accuracy in problem classification and step-by-step solutions.

name: HTML-to-JSON-Blocks-Library
title: HTML to JSON Blocks Library
description: Developed a Python library to convert HTML content into structured JSON blocks. Implemented a modular design with custom image handling capabilities.
